OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD URGENT DENTAL CARE SERVICE (NHS SHEFFIELD)

Desc.entry: An urgent dental care service provided on behalf of NHS Sheffield on weekdays, weekday evenings, weekends and Bank Holidays for all Sheffield residents. Referral is usually through the dedicated helpline - 0844 736 8440.

Telephone.entry: for general advice on dental services
Sheffield PCT helpline for finding a dentist, leave an answerphone message & you will be called back
